name: peashooter
description: A simple remote server to store text logs shot to it with a live dashboard

PEASHOOTER_TITLE.description: The title for the logger. This shows up a in the title tag and top of the dashboard.

PEASHOOTER_USERNAME.description: The username for basic auth. Set a username and password to enable basic auth.

PEASHOOTER_PASSWORD.description: The username for basic auth. Set a username and password to enable basic auth.

PEASHOOTER_HIDE_INFO.description: Wether or not to hide the about and sample code in the dashboard. Default the default value is false. If set to false, basic auth details are made visible.
